thread.title: Morning Report: Pro fighters react to epic Super Bowl comeback
thread.title_full: Morning Report: Pro fighters react to epic Super Bowl comeback

author: Jed Meshew
title: Morning Report: Pro fighters react to epic Super Bowl comeback
text: Dana White and Tyron Woodley at the Super Bowl Dana White’s Instagram On Saturday in Houston, Texas, the Korean Zombie made his return to the octagon after 42 months away from competition, knocking out ninth-ranked Dennis Bermudez in spectacular fashion in the first round. Unfortunately for him, KZ’s knockout wasn’t even the most incredible thing to happen in Houston that weekend. A day after Chan Sung Jung punched out Bermudez, the New England Patriots completed the biggest comeback in Super Bowl history, beating the Atlanta Falcons in overtime in and ensuring that no one will be talking about the UFC around the water cooler at work today. The monumental nature of the comeback is all anyone could talk about last night, including many MMA fighters and especially UFC President Dana White . Check out their reactions to the big game below. A photo posted by Dana White (@danawhite) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:24pm PST —— — Amanda Nunes (@Amanda_Leoa) February 5, 2017 —— — Brendan Schaub (@BrendanSchaub) February 5, 2017 —— A photo posted by Dana White (@danawhite) on Feb 5, 2017 at 5:56pm PST —— — Brian Stann (@BrianStann) February 6, 2017 —— Here is @Jon_Anik soon!!! He may never talk to me again after this game. Could make the broadcast tough #RiseUp pic.twitter.com/oPAbjn52M2 — Brian Stann (@BrianStann) February 6, 2017 —— — Jon Anik (@Jon_Anik) February 6, 2017 —— — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) February 6, 2017 —— — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) February 6, 2017 —— A photo posted by Derrick Lewis (@thebeastufc) on Feb 5, 2017 at 5:50pm PST —— Time to #RISEUP !!! Man, what a performance so far by the #Falcons . Still another half to go tho — Aljamain Sterling (@FunkMaster_UFC) February 6, 2017 —— — Rashad Evans (@SugaRashadEvans) February 6, 2017 —— — Jon Anik (@Jon_Anik) February 6, 2017 —— Current mood: The only one out of all my friends to put money on Atlanta #superbowl #wegoinsizzler #dirtybirds pic.twitter.com/v9soqU71LM — Brendan Schaub (@BrendanSchaub) February 6, 2017 —— — Marion Reneau (@BelizeanBruiser) February 6, 2017 —— A photo posted by titoortiz1999 (@titoortiz1999) on Feb 5, 2017 at 5:32pm PST —— #stephengostkowski was looking back like they have him the deflated football for that extra point after he missed.... lol #SuperBowl — Corey Anderson UFC (@CoreyA_MMA) February 6, 2017 —— — Gerald Harris (@GHurricane) February 6, 2017 —— Why the #Falcons not killing the clock with 20 sec to hike the ball?? Yall not losing. Need to seal the deal, and give the no time to Pats! — Aljamain Sterling (@FunkMaster_UFC) February 6, 2017 —— — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) February 6, 2017 —— I'm not sure what is going on, but #Falcons PLEASE keep it together. 3.5 min of focus. Let's go!! (I just don't want the Pats to win again) — Aljamain Sterling (@FunkMaster_UFC) February 6, 2017 —— Of course the pats are making a comeback ... wtf else is Tom Brady supposed to do besides win? — Ian McCall (@Unclecreepymma) February 6, 2017 —— — Brian Stann (@BrianStann) February 6, 2017 —— Brady, you didn't even have to do this to be the greatest but ummm, you're the greatest! #SuperBowl2017 — Kenny Florian (@kennyflorian) February 6, 2017 —— — Gerald Harris (@GHurricane) February 6, 2017 —— A video posted by Tyron Woodley (@twooodley) on Feb 5, 2017 at 7:09pm PST —— — Amanda Nunes (@Amanda_Leoa) February 6, 2017 —— — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) February 6, 2017 —— — Joe Lauzon (@JoeLauzon) February 6, 2017 —— — Daniel Cormier (@dc_mma) February 6, 2017 —— Just won an easy $1000 from @Artj97 . Big thank you and congratulations to the New England patriots — Jon Bones Jones (@JonnyBones) February 6, 2017 —— — Cole Miller (@colemillerATT) February 6, 2017 —— A photo posted by Dana White (@danawhite) on Feb 5, 2017 at 7:31pm PST —— A photo posted by Tyron Woodley (@twooodley) on Feb 5, 2017 at 7:48pm PST —— A photo posted by titoortiz1999 (@titoortiz1999) on Feb 5, 2017 at 7:37pm PST ——
